function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Use of crowdsourced entity resolution approach for finding entity matches","category":"Modeling and simulation risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Robots and drones reducing interpersonal contact leading to potential loss of human connection and empathy.","category":"Innovation and adoption risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Requirement of laser treatment and sunlight exposure for reusable graphene-coated face masks","category":"Healthcare infrastructure and technology adoption risks ","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inefficient negative air ionization","category":"Operational and implementation risks ","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inefficient medication delivery","category":"Operational and implementation risks ","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of widely-accepted surveillance system for detecting the potential community presence of covid-19 through wastewater monitoring.","category":"Healthcare infrastructure and technology adoption risks ","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Wearable technology not optimized for different groups with different lifestyles and circumstances, leading to discomfort and potential health issues.","category":"Healthcare infrastructure and technology adoption risks ","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Deployment of mobile applications for covid-19 risk detection","category":"Healthcare infrastructure and technology adoption risks ","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on wearable technology for early detection of covid-19 without clinical reliability may lead to complacency and lack of adherence to other preventive measures.","category":"Healthcare infrastructure and technology adoption risks ","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential risk of false readings from the infrared thermometers leading to incorrect assessment of body temperatures.","category":"Healthcare infrastructure and technology adoption risks ","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of mobile application for contact tracing","category":"Healthcare infrastructure and technology adoption risks ","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Indirect association between pedestrian links per square mile and covid-19 mortality rate through street connectivity","category":"Infrastructure and connectivity risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"High-definition, no delay video consultation in the hospital may lead to over-reliance on remote healthcare and delay in seeking in-person medical attention for critical conditions.","category":"Innovation and adoption risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Kt platform not providing trustworthy evidence during the pandemic","category":"Operational and implementation risks ","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Utilization of drones, robotics, and image processing technologies for identifying high-risk zones may lead to public anxiety and distrust.","category":"Innovation and adoption risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Prolonged lysis phase during rna extraction","category":"Operational and implementation risks ","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Unequal condition for speed and generalisability testing on the otc dataset","category":"Operational and implementation risks ","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Calibration errors due to imprecise sensor","category":"Operational and implementation risks ","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Dependence on 5g for hosting network functions may increase the risk of spreading contagious diseases if the network is not adequately secured or
